content: Also partially offsetting the benefit of higher product selling prices was a sales volume headwind representing approximately $6 million of EBITDA related to the impact on volume of delayed fertilizer purchases by farmers, particularly ammonia due to wet weather in certain areas of the U.S. Additionally, from an LSB-specific perspective, in the second half of 2021, we increased our nitric acid production and sales in favor of building inventory of HDAN and selling that inventory in the first quarter, which is what we have historically done.
